DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.adminDescription: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on behalf of the signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, on your behalf. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
Application.adminDescription: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs in chats
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs in chats the signed-in user can access.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs in chats
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs in chats you can access.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for all chats
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for any chat, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs in teams
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs to teams the signed-in user can access.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Allow the app to manage all tabs in teams
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs to teams you can access.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for all teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs in any team, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for a user
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for you
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for you.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the app to manage all tabs for all users
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for any user, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs in chats
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs in chats the signed-in user can access.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs in chats
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs in chats you can access.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs for all chats
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs for any chat, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs in teams
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs to teams the signed-in user can access.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs in teams
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs to teams you can access.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs for all teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs in any team, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs for a user
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs for the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs for you
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs for you.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs for all users
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs for any user, without a signed-in user.
